# MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.automatic

**Case**

The value that represents the automatic context style.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

This value tells the framework to automatically select the content style for address representations. For example, when used with [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAddressRepresentations/cityWithContext(_:)] MapKit only includes the region.

## Available context styles

- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.short**: The value that represents the short context style.
- **MKAddressRepresentations.ContextStyle.full**: The value that represents the full context style.
